name: sketchers
title: running sneakers
description: Slip on bungee laced athletic sporty walking sneaker design; Zigzag stitched toe seam detail Side

name: converse
title: regular sneakers
description: Converse was one of the first shoe brands that women could turn to for the feminine style they coveted and the comfort they thought was impossible to attain. Converse fresh, unpretentious designs are a smooth fit with your wardrobe, your life and your own unique style. Converse promises style that makes you look good and feel good - always.

name: jordans
title: mens sneakers
description: Jordans are super-comfortable, and a high-performance solution for any athletic man looking for one shoe to do it all. Designed for intermediate basketball players, grippy FriXion RS rubber soles, and a low- asymmetry RN45 shoe shape, lending plenty of grip, support, and sensitivity. Refusing to sacrifice comfort for technical performance, the synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for beginner to mid level players, and the unlined leather upper and breathable lined tongue are comfy and soft. Whether hitting your local gym wall or an expert-level pitch, this men's one-quiver shoe will keep you moving up.
